database

Class DatabaseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.DatabaseManager

  • public class DatabaseManager
extends java.lang.Object
    General container for the Match, Team and Player databases. Contains getter methods in order to access objects from database.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DatabaseManager()

                      throws MatchNotFoundException
        Getter method returns match that matches matchID

        matchID - matchID of match
        Returns:
        match match with matching MatchID
        Throws:
        MatchNotFoundException - Match not found in database

                                               throws EmptyListException
        Getter method that returns a list of the matchs
        Returns:
        list of matchs
        Throws:
        EmptyListException - Exception caused by a database with an empty list of matchs
